laboratory_examinations.findings: Mild gaseous distention of multiple loops of bowel likely represents postoperative ileus. Catheter projects over the left femoral region; large central drainage catheter in the mid abdomen. Two towels known to be left within the abdominal cavity.

laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: UOP ranging from low to <10cc/hr over time

laboratory_examinations.findings: Bolus of rocuronium given; no paralytics since.
